summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Loretta Place, in The City of Seattle, from Summit Avenue North to Bellevue Avenue North, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1417 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
